name: GALAXY RUSH (XeaKK)
description:
You are escaping the dangerous Asteroid Belt and you're mission is to escape the Asteroid Belt with you're trusty Space Ship, you will run into lots of asteroids!, Good Luck Captain!

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

                                                                          CONTROLS

Use the Right and left Arrow Keys or A and D Keys 
to Control the Spaceship, Avoid the Asteroids, and have fun!
